description: This is the full usual circuit of Crystal Line (E), Iron Springs, Elbow Trail, SunDog, Crystal Line (W) and back. All the trails are green flat and are good for beginners.
directions: From the very south of Calgary, drive west to Hiway 22, then South to Bragg Creek. Into Bragg, cross the bridge and turn left at the Tee intersection. 14km to parking lot at end of road.
title: Crystal Line & Elbow Trail & Iron Springs Loop/West Bragg
